VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Parcel Services relative to Oceanic Carriers?
SRP.A: Parcel Services is {above} Oceanic Carriers in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cargo shipments?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Oceanic Carriers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cargo shipments?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Parcel Services}.

VE.Q: What is Parcel Services's Cargo Shipments in 1982?
VE.A: Parcel Services's cargo shipments in 1982 is {25480.29} tons/month.

VE.Q: What is Continental Freight's Cargo Shipments in 1990?
VE.A: Continental Freight's cargo shipments in 1990 is {195319.89} tons/month.

VE.Q: What is Parcel Services's Cargo Shipments in 1972?
VE.A: Parcel Services's cargo shipments in 1972 is {89640.61} tons/month.

VE.Q: What are the cargo shipments of Continental Freight, Parcel Services, and Oceanic Carriers in 1981?
VE.A: Continental Freight's cargo shipments is {145650.86} tons/month, Parcel Services's cargo shipments is {33757.07} tons/month, Oceanic Carriers's cargo shipments is {271779.70} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Cargo Shipments in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum cargo shipments is {5580.44} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Cargo Shipments in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum cargo shipments is {799075.65} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Cargo Shipments level recorded for Continental Freight?
EVJ.A: Continental Freight reached approximately {213756.84} tons/month in {1992}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Cargo Shipments level recorded for Continental Freight?
EVJ.A: Continental Freight's lowest recorded level is approximately {95801.37} tons/month in {1971}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Cargo Shipments?
SC.A: The average total cargo shipments is {540006.58} tons/month.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cargo Shipments go below 380633.65 tons/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cargo Shipments exceed 623309.01 tons/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Cargo Shipments in 1981 higher or lower than in 1991?
NC.A: The total cargo shipments in 1981 was {lower} than in 1991.

NC.Q: Was the total Cargo Shipments in 1983 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total cargo shipments in 1983 was {lower} than in 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1988, was the average total Cargo Shipments higher or lower than between 1978 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total cargo shipments between 1981 and 1988 was {higher} than between 1978 and 1980.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1983, was the average total Cargo Shipments higher or lower than between 1971 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total cargo shipments between 1980 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1971 and 1993.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Oceanic Carriers} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Parcel Services, Continental Freight, Oceanic Carriers}.
